title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not being persisted between sessions.
OB: After closing the application and reopening it, the files that were previously opened do not appear in the MRU list in the File menu.
EB: The files that were previously opened should be persisted between sessions and appear in the MRU list in the File menu.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application.
5. Go to the File menu and check the MRU list.
Expected result: The files that were previously opened should be listed in the MRU list.
